website_summaries.verdict: A powerful 50-watt megaphone with volume control that makes it appropriate for indoor and outdoor activities.
pros: This megaphone features a detachable microphone as well as a 3.5mm input that allows the unit to function as a speaker for other devices
The volume control lets you tailor the megaphone for a variety of situations, and the siren is great for quickly gaining attention
cons: You need to hold the microphone directly in front of your mouth for it to work properly

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very loud
customer_reviews.text: Made from very high-quality materials. I saw a few reviews saying that it was very easy to accidentally click on the siren option. I disagree there Is an audible click and feel when swapping between off, talk, and siren. If you’re in the market for a megaphone this is the one to get. Also a shoulder strap which comes very handy! If this review was helpful please let me know by clicking the “Helpful” button below the review.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect a long life with this.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this megaphone to lead cheers for a pro soccer team and it worked fine. It was actually impressive. However, towards the end of the second game I was using this item, it stopped working. I tried using it again and it worked fine, but periodically it would cut out. Then for the fourth game it wouldn't work at all, and still it does not work at all. Highly disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Super unhappy with this

customer_reviews.title: Loud

I like how you can either sling the megaphone and use the handheld mic, or latch the mic bullhorn and use the trigger like a regular bullhorn. Noticed the rubber guard around the edge of the cone was slightly torn at the bottom. Not sure if that was there out of the box or after the event. Has no impact on operation.

Quality is not fantastic.....I was trying to open the battery door to add the initial set of batteries, and a small black plastic retainer clip broke off. This is within 5 minutes of me unboxing the unit. However the battery door retention clip seems to stay closed ok, even without this little plastic clip. Time will tell if it actually holds up. customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this. I'm a drama teacher and I don't have to yell at the 12 year olds anymore, just talk into the microphone.
customer_reviews.author: jayhaweezer

customer_reviews.title: Love this megaphone!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product; priced fairly. Lightweight but powerful and looks great! I am very happy with this device.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, matched product description
customer_reviews.text: This megaphone is quite loud, perhaps not loud enough to disperse a riot, but more than sufficient to organize a football game or track meet. The bell is made of high-impact PVC, and comes with a rubber guard for protection against scratches and chipping when you put the horn down. I like how the battery compartment has a latch, so it will not accidentally fall open.All the features on my horn work: the aux/MP3 player, siren, and mic. The attachment for the mic is the only part which seems a little flimsy to me; a good, direct hit to the back of the phone would definitely break off the mic's clip. Other than that, a fantastic product!
customer_reviews.author: Cal Kiac

customer_reviews.title: This is so powerfully loud!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hope I didn't lose my hearing G-D forbid, from this megaphone, it is way too LOUD!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Worst Megaphone ever
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. Sound was super weak. did not amplify.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha F.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DESIGN
customer_reviews.text: The volume is awesome. It wears in the wrists a bit, after long use, as the batteries make it heavy. I really appreciate the AUX input for PICKET LINE MUSIC, as well as the clear and concise siren/off/talk button. There are NO ACCIDENTAL SIRENS, as with other models. If there was a way to make it lighter, it would have a solid 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mel H.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a few hours
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to use at a soccer camp I was running. In fact, I had it shipped overnight to the event site, as I needed it to help direct people across a soccer field. Within the first few hours of use, the megaphone stopped working. All I get is a clicking noise when I turn it on. Extremely disappointing!

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, crappy
customer_reviews.text: Its just really not very well made. Straight out of the box my Mic button is broken so every time the megaphone is on the button is pressed in. It is decently loud but is powered by 8 C batteries which is a pain, and my guess is this thing cost about 5 dollars to build. Anything built by Pyle is generally garbage so I dont know what I expected.
